import React from 'react' import "../css/Projects.css" import {VscTriangleDown } from "react-icons/vsc" import { SiGithub } from 'react-icons/si' import { FaRocket } from 'react-icons/fa' export default function Projects() { return

PROJECTS

{/* Project 1 */}
{/* */}

TrickNastics: Landing Page

The TrickNastics Landing Page is suitable for web and mobile, this is a full stack app formed of a React.js frontend and a Python/Flask backend talking to a PostreSQL database hosted on a Heroku server.


In order to gain experience working across the full stack
